metadata.title: CVE-2017-15612 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: mistune.py in Mistune 0.7.4 allows XSS via an unexpected newline (such as in java\nscript:) or a crafted email address, related to the escape and autolink functions.

criterions.comment: mistune package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.3-2').
